description:
My place is right across the street from Prospect Park, and right around the corner of the Q subway 'Prospect Park' stop, which will bring you to Union Square within 20 minutes. You’ll love my place because of the location and the safe,gentrifying, diverse neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space is spacious, homy and clean. There is a  lot of light since there are two windows facing the street.

You will have complete access to the space.

I am quick to respond via text during your stay, should you want advice on exploring the city.

We have across the street the beautiful Prospect Park, which is car-free, nicely quiet and more or less tourist-free compared to Central Park.
The neighborhood is safe and laid-back and has a couple of nice coffeeshops (tugboat tea company,Erv's), groceryshops (wholesome, OJ food-corp (open 24/7)) with ATM's and(cocktail)bars (midwood flats, Erv's) and I believe a bagel shop just opened up on Lincoln road. From Ocean avenue to Union square (14th street) it's about 20 minutes by subway and little over an hour by bike.

The apartment is right around the corner of the 'Prospect Park' subway stop, which serves the Q line (runs 24/7) the B line (doesn't run after midnight or weekends) and the Franklin avenue Shuttle (for connection to the blue line which runs to JFK airport). It will run all day and night, and will bring you to Union Square in 20 minutes.

I'm very open and responsive to any questions.
name: Spacy, sunny Brooklyn studio next to prospect park
